text: Hessafe guye tani algata beyadis. He algata bolla pirda pirdanas godateth isttas imettidayti uttidayta beyadis. Qasseka Yesusa gishshi istti markattida gishshine Xoossa qaala gishshi istta qoodhey qanxettida asata shempoka beyadis. Heytantti do7azasine iza misilezas goynibeyttena. Iza malataka ba liipho bolla gidin ba kushe bolla wothonttaytakko. Istti hayqope dendida Kiristoosara issife shi layth kawotida.
